actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Thurmond without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 598.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution relating to the commemoration of the bicentennial of the Senate of the United States.

summary.text: Establishes a Commission on the Bicentennial of the United States Senate to oversee and coordinate bicentennial activities. Sets forth the composition of, and Senate offices responsible for staffing, the Commission. Directs the Commission to seek to assemble a private sector task force to explore private sector bicentennial project ideas and funding. Requires the Commission to submit a final report to the Senate upon its termination at the end of the 101st Congress.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the commemoration of the bicentennial of the Senate of the United States.
